aka: 英国国家剧院现场：理发店纪事

cast.name: 费塞友·阿金那德 Fisayo Akinade
梅纳德·埃济亚施 Maynard Eziashi
阿卜杜勒·萨利斯 Abdul Salis
安东尼·威尔士 Anthony Welsh
哈米德·阿尼玛沙恩 Hammed Animashaun

language: 尼日利亚皮钦语 Nigerian Pidgin
this_title: National Theatre Live: Barber Shop Chronicles
trans_title: 英国国家剧院现场：理发店纪事
introduction: Newsroom, political platform, local hotspot, confession box, preacher-pulpit and football stadium. For generations, African men have gathered in barber shops to discuss the world. These are places where the banter can be barbed and the truth is always telling.Directed by Olivier award-winning director Bijan Sheibani, Barber Shop Chronicles is a heart-warming, hilarious and insightful new play that leaps from a barber shop in Peckham to Johannesburg, Harare, Kampala, Lagos and Accra over the course of a single day.
foreign_title: National Theatre Live: Barber Shop Chronicles
